7.title: Grenade Games Dubai

episode of.title: The Adventures of Danny & The Dingo (TV Series 2008– )

7.plot: Being in the middle of the desert doesn't stop the gang from snowboarding. Despite Dingo's questionable promotion, a big crowd of locals turns out to compete in the first-ever Grenade Games Dubai -- an event unlike anything they'd ever seen.

10.title: Buffalo Pregnancy Test

episode of.title: The Adventures of Danny & The Dingo (TV Series 2008– )

10.plot: Danny and the Dingo become Costa Rican ranchers, dancers, and croc hunters.

12.title: Viva La Chile

episode of.title: The Adventures of Danny & The Dingo (TV Series 2008– )

12.plot: Danny, the Dingo, and their snowboard crew spread the shred all the way to the Andes Mountains and celebrate Chile's independence at the Fonda.

14.title: Deep Inside: The Adventures of Danny & the Dingo

episode of.title: The Adventures of Danny & The Dingo (TV Series 2008– )

14.plot: The Danny and The Dingo discuss the entertaining aspects of making television while traveling around the world with their friends.

1.title: Launching in Aspen

episode of.title: The Adventures of Danny & The Dingo (TV Series 2008– )

1.plot: The gang kicks off the tour with Danny competing at the X-Games in Aspen, Colorado. We are introduced to Kevin Casillo, Kirsten, Danny, The Dingo, and Big Vern, their dog.

2.title: New York! New York!

episode of.title: The Adventures of Danny & The Dingo (TV Series 2008– )

2.plot: Danny makes a spur of the moment decision to go to New York City, for the Union Square Rail jam. Dingo hosts the event, and this is where viewers are introduced to Grenade Team rider and newest member of the tour, Lucas Magoon.

3.title: Valentine's Day

episode of.title: The Adventures of Danny & The Dingo (TV Series 2008– )

3.plot: The gang heads to NJ for Danny's hometown stop and sessions some local wood rails, and Dingo returns to NY for a Valentine's date.

4.title: Mountain Creek

episode of.title: The Adventures of Danny & The Dingo (TV Series 2008– )

4.plot: Danny's ex arrives for the Mountain Creek stop of the tour, where the crew does some snowboarding before judging the contest.

5.title: Layover in Cleveland

episode of.title: The Adventures of Danny & The Dingo (TV Series 2008– )

5.plot: The crew visit camera man Corolla's mom in Cleveland and are greeted by a 9:00am happy hour, and Danny and Lucas get tattoos.

6.title: Raging Buffalo

episode of.title: The Adventures of Danny & The Dingo (TV Series 2008– )

6.plot: The boys finish their last Zumiez signing in Long Island.

7.title: Vans Tahoe Cup

episode of.title: The Adventures of Danny & The Dingo (TV Series 2008– )

7.plot: The gang meets up with wildcard winner, Chaz Chaffee, at the water park to officially give him his ticket to Grenade Games as well as try out indoor surfing.

8.title: A New Grenade Team Rider!

episode of.title: The Adventures of Danny & The Dingo (TV Series 2008– )

8.plot: The entire Grenade family meets at their headquarters in Portland, OR. After a quick skate session everyone boards the bus for Snoqualmie to get the Grenade Games underway.

1.title: Street Credit

episode of.title: The Adventures of Danny & The Dingo (TV Series 2008– )

1.plot: Danny and Dingo meet Rob Dyrdek in Hollywood in search of Street credit. Then they head to San Diego for a trade show and their first premiere of The Boned Age.

2.title: Shoving Off

episode of.title: The Adventures of Danny & The Dingo (TV Series 2008– )

2.plot: Danny and Dingo promote The Boned Age in Santa Monica, hire a Playboy Playmate for an assistant, and pick up skaters David Gravette, Devon Appelo, Tom Tom, and Clyde Singleton.

3.title: Pitching a Tent

episode of.title: The Adventures of Danny & The Dingo (TV Series 2008– )

3.plot: "En route to Reno, Danny and Dingo go camping in Utah and pick up skaters Silent Mike and Willis, plus Greanade riders Lucas Magoon and Louie Vito."

4.title: Skate and Destroy

episode of.title: The Adventures of Danny & The Dingo (TV Series 2008– )

4.plot: After a long night Dingo decides to go to the hospital, and the crew faces crisis when the RV starts to have major problems.

5.title: Freak Out

episode of.title: The Adventures of Danny & The Dingo (TV Series 2008– )

5.plot: Willis clashes with a bouncer at the Denver premiere before the crew sets off for Cedar Point where they celebrate Danny's birthday. Also, Playboy Playmate Heather gets the boot.

6.title: Dirty Jersey

episode of.title: The Adventures of Danny & The Dingo (TV Series 2008– )

6.plot: The crew surfs with Shane Pospisil in New Jersey, and Danny visits his parents. Plus, Grenade rider Scotty Lago is picked up.

7.title: Fed up with Goon

episode of.title: The Adventures of Danny & The Dingo (TV Series 2008– )

7.plot: The crew heads to Cleveland, and Goon's annoying antics earn repercussion.

1.title: Korear

episode of.title: The Adventures of Danny & The Dingo (TV Series 2008– )

1.plot: Danny, Dingo, Scotty, Lucas, and Tom Tom kick off the season in Korea with Afro Mike. Someone gets so drunk that he allows the crew to hit golf balls off him on the hotel roof to apologize for his actions.

2.title: Hello, Tokyo!

episode of.title: The Adventures of Danny & The Dingo (TV Series 2008– )

2.plot: Danny, Scotty, and Lucas get on their boards for the first time of the season, and do a photoshoot for Maxim Korea. Then it's off to Mt. Fuji in Japan for a costume contest and some nightime shenanigans.

3.title: First Competition

episode of.title: The Adventures of Danny & The Dingo (TV Series 2008– )

3.plot: The gang is stopped in Amsterdam when it's found out that Lucas has a women's passport. Scotty wins best trick at the World Cup Big Air comp. with a double backflip 360.

4.title: Teen Wolf

episode of.title: The Adventures of Danny & The Dingo (TV Series 2008– )

4.plot: Danny's got food poisoning at the hotel in Spain, but the rest of the team needs to solidify their qualifications for the 2010 Olympics by competing at the World Cup Halfpipe. Kevin and Dingo hit up some skate spots in Barcelona and partake in a little "Teen Wolf" inspired surfing skills on the ride home.

5.title: US Open

episode of.title: The Adventures of Danny & The Dingo (TV Series 2008– )

5.plot: The Grenade Team leaves Spain for Stratton Mountains, VT, but learns they have no place to stay. But that doesn't stop Danny from trying to 5-peat the nest day at the US Open halfpipe competition.

6.title: The Grenade Games

episode of.title: The Adventures of Danny & The Dingo (TV Series 2008– )

6.plot: Fresh off the US Open win, the Grenade crew heads to Whistler, BC for the 5th annual Grenade Games. Dave Fortin has a near-deadly slam.

7.title: Gumball 3000

episode of.title: The Adventures of Danny & The Dingo (TV Series 2008– )

7.plot: With the snowboard season behind them, Danny, Dingo, and the boys decide to take part in a 3,000-mile road race from Los Angeles to Miami Beach in the Gumball Rally, using the Grenade RV as their entry.

5.title: The Games

episode of.title: The Adventures of Danny & The Dingo (TV Series 2008– )

5.plot: Grenade Games kicks off with exclusive events like the dual mogul slalom, jam format super-pipe and piÃ±ata. Stakes are high with the largest cash prize in Grenade Games history and a new Chevy Camaro up for grabs.

-1.title: Gettin' El Gaucho

episode of.title: The Adventures of Danny & The Dingo (TV Series 2008– )

-1.plot: After participating in an Argentine polo match, Danny, Dingo and the shred crew apply their newfound knowledge to the skate park and invent a new sport, Skate Polo.

imdb.title: The Adventures of Danny & The Dingo
akas: The Adventures of Danny & The Dingo (United States)
plot: Two-time Olympic silver medalist Danny Kass, snowboarder personality The Dingo, and Lucas Magoon go on a cross country trip in search of the next Grenade team member.::Anonymous
